text:
The Corporation will conduct the

weekly grievances redress day meeting at the

newly inaugurated ‘Amma

People Service Centres’ at all the four zones on

every Wednesdays.

A press release

from Corporation Commissioner

K.R. Selvaraj said that

the grievance meeting

was held at corporation

office in Hanging Garden on every Tuesdays till now. Since the centres were inaugurated by

Chief Minister last week,

people can submit

their petitions at the

centre on every Wednesdays.
title: Grievances day meetings shifted
